Â¡ Â¦ Â¡ Â¥ The New Jocks TNJ wants to preserve the Earth and all of its components by minimizing waste , creating designs that are versatile with the aim of using less energy and labor , creating designs that are multifaceted like the transformable skirt and leggings , and using waste such as scraps in our very own designs as long as doing so does not increase the amount of labor , and finally by increasing our fabric yield by making sure all pattern pieces are shaped similarly to rectangles and squares;;[('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â¦', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â¥', 'O'), ('The', 'O'), ('New', 'O'), ('Jocks', 'O'), ('TNJ', 'O'), ('wants', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('preserve', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('Earth', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('all', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('its', 'O'), ('components', 'O'), ('by', 'O'), ('minimizing', 'O'), ('waste', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('creating', 'O'), ('designs', 'O'), ('that', 'O'), ('are', 'O'), ('versatile', 'O'), ('with', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('aim', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('using', 'O'), ('less', 'O'), ('energy', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('labor', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('creating', 'O'), ('designs', 'O'), ('that', 'O'), ('are', 'O'), ('multifaceted', 'O'), ('like', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('transformable', 'PER'), ('skirt', 'PER'), ('and', 'O'), ('leggings', 'PER'), (',', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('using', 'O'), ('waste', 'O'), ('such', 'O'), ('as', 'O'), ('scraps', 'O'), ('in', 'O'), ('our', 'O'), ('very', 'O'), ('own', 'O'), ('designs', 'O'), ('as', 'O'), ('long', 'O'), ('as', 'O'), ('doing', 'O'), ('so', 'O'), ('does', 'O'), ('not', 'O'), ('increase', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('amount', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('labor', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('finally', 'O'), ('by', 'O'), ('increasing', 'O'), ('our', 'O'), ('fabric', 'O'), ('yield', 'O'), ('by', 'O'), ('making', 'O'), ('sure', 'O'), ('all', 'O'), ('pattern', 'O'), ('pieces', 'O'), ('are', 'O'), ('shaped', 'O'), ('similarly', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('rectangles', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('squares', 'O')]

And as an interpretation of what the American-based designer believes in Â¡ Âª sportswear , lightness and youthful energy Â¡ Âª it was well done;;[('And', 'O'), ('as', 'O'), ('an', 'O'), ('interpretation', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('what', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('American-based', 'O'), ('designer', 'O'), ('believes', 'O'), ('in', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Âª', 'PER'), ('sportswear', 'PER'), (',', 'O'), ('lightness', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('youthful', 'O'), ('energy', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Âª', 'O'), ('it', 'O'), ('was', 'O'), ('well', 'O'), ('done', 'O')]

Margiela Looks Back PARIS Fifteen years ago and only five years after starting his label , the Belgian designer Martin Margiela decided to recreate his favorite designs of his then-short career , taking his deconstructed shirts and backward-turning coats and , after dyeing all the clothes gray , presenting them as a new collection;;[('Margiela', 'O'), ('Looks', 'O'), ('Back', 'O'), ('PARIS', 'O'), ('Fifteen', 'O'), ('years', 'O'), ('ago', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('only', 'O'), ('five', 'O'), ('years', 'O'), ('after', 'O'), ('starting', 'O'), ('his', 'O'), ('label', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('Belgian', 'O'), ('designer', 'O'), ('Martin', 'O'), ('Margiela', 'O'), ('decided', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('recreate', 'O'), ('his', 'O'), ('favorite', 'O'), ('designs', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('his', 'O'), ('then-short', 'O'), ('career', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('taking', 'O'), ('his', 'O'), ('deconstructed', 'PER'), ('shirts', 'PER'), ('and', 'O'), ('backward-turning', 'PER'), ('coats', 'PER'), ('and', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('after', 'O'), ('dyeing', 'O'), ('all', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('clothes', 'PER'), ('gray', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('presenting', 'O'), ('them', 'O'), ('as', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('new', 'O'), ('collection', 'O')]

More Â¡ Â° upcycling Â¡ Â® Â¡ Â¯ ideas from the magpie collector : leather purses with Victorian-era post cards laminated on the front ; using the base of soda drink cans to create metallic dots on a satchel Â¡ Â¯ s leather surface ; and putting a big ring-pull hole in the front of bag so loose change can be dropped through and into a zippered purse inside;;[('More', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â°', 'O'), ('upcycling', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â®', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â¯', 'O'), ('ideas', 'O'), ('from', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('magpie', 'O'), ('collector', 'O'), (':', 'O'), ('leather', 'O'), ('purses', 'O'), ('with', 'O'), ('Victorian-era', 'O'), ('post', 'O'), ('cards', 'O'), ('laminated', 'O'), ('on', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('front', 'O'), (';', 'O'), ('using', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('base', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('soda', 'O'), ('drink', 'O'), ('cans', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('create', 'O'), ('metallic', 'O'), ('dots', 'O'), ('on', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('satchel', 'O'), ('Â¡', 'O'), ('Â¯', 'O'), ('s', 'O'), ('leather', 'O'), ('surface', 'O'), (';', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('putting', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('big', 'O'), ('ring-pull', 'O'), ('hole', 'O'), ('in', 'O'), ('the', 'O'), ('front', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('bag', 'PER'), ('so', 'O'), ('loose', 'O'), ('change', 'O'), ('can', 'O'), ('be', 'O'), ('dropped', 'O'), ('through', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('into', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('zippered', 'O'), ('purse', 'O'), ('inside', 'O')]

But how can you adapt these trendy concepts into your work-friendly wardrobe , without sacrificing your professional image ? One way is to take a single element of a current trend , and slip it in unobtrusively , rather than doing that look top-to-toe ; this is easiest to achieve in your accessories , hair , and cosmetics;;[('But', 'O'), ('how', 'O'), ('can', 'O'), ('you', 'O'), ('adapt', 'O'), ('these', 'O'), ('trendy', 'O'), ('concepts', 'O'), ('into', 'O'), ('your', 'O'), ('work-friendly', 'O'), ('wardrobe', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('without', 'O'), ('sacrificing', 'O'), ('your', 'O'), ('professional', 'O'), ('image', 'O'), ('?', 'O'), ('One', 'O'), ('way', 'O'), ('is', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('take', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('single', 'O'), ('element', 'O'), ('of', 'O'), ('a', 'O'), ('current', 'O'), ('trend', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('slip', 'PER'), ('it', 'O'), ('in', 'O'), ('unobtrusively', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('rather', 'O'), ('than', 'O'), ('doing', 'O'), ('that', 'O'), ('look', 'O'), ('top-to-toe', 'O'), (';', 'O'), ('this', 'O'), ('is', 'O'), ('easiest', 'O'), ('to', 'O'), ('achieve', 'O'), ('in', 'O'), ('your', 'O'), ('accessories', 'PER'), (',', 'O'), ('hair', 'O'), (',', 'O'), ('and', 'O'), ('cosmetics', 'O')]
